Text: I want to thank those people who made such a big turnout right away for this movie... I believe it has an important moral to give, and it was presented with respect for the veteran as much as for those who support them.

To those dedicated seeders who steadfastly remained during my loooong, loooong download, a heartfelt "thank you!"

Was really cool to see again :)
Thanks for the good words, Pelican... glad you enjoyed it.  ;~}
